titleStmt.title: Memorialls for the government of the royal-burghs in Scotland with some overtures laid before the nobility and gentry of several shyres in this kingdom : as also, a survey of the city of Aberdeen with the epigrams of Arthur Iohnstoun, Doctor of Medicine, upon some of our chief burghs translated into English by I.B. / by Philopoliteious (or,) a lover of the publick well-fare.
titleStmt.author: Skene, Alexander.

titleStmt.title: Memorialls for the government of the royal-burghs in Scotland with some overtures laid before the nobility and gentry of several shyres in this kingdom : as also, a survey of the city of Aberdeen with the epigrams of Arthur Iohnstoun, Doctor of Medicine, upon some of our chief burghs translated into English by I.B. / by Philopoliteious (or,) a lover of the publick well-fare.
titleStmt.author: Skene, Alexander.
Johnstoun, Arthur, 1587-1641.
Barclay, John, 1582-1621.

notesStmt.note: Author's name on t.p., "Philopoliteious", in Greek characters.
Attributed to Alexander Skene by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
